text: Americans could start to see shortages of pork, chicken and beef on grocery shelves as soon as May as major packing plants swept by the coronavirus remain shuttered and the nation’s massive stockpiles of frozen meat begin to dwindle https://t.co/H5b3ydWLDW

urls.title: Save your bacon: A real meat shortage looms with virus shutdowns
urls.description: Multiple economists who spoke with POLITICO said May could be when consumers have fewer options when buying meat.
